person.persName: George W. Berry (Captain & provost marshal of the 6th Military District of Kentucky)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Adelaide Jamison Berry on January 4, 1849. Father of Thomas Berry, Anastatia Berry, and Edward A. Berry. Commissioner of the Licking and Lexington Railroad in 1846. Postmaster of Berry's Station, Kentucky from 1856 to 1858Owned seven enslaved persons in 1860. Commissioner of the Colemansville and Williamson Turnpike Road in 1860. Captain and provost marshal of the 6th Military District of Kentucky in 1863. Captain and colonel of the Harrison County Home Guards in 1864. Killed at the Battle of Cynthiana on June 17, 1864.
